item.title: About me
item.description: Summary I have 10 years of experience in computational and theoretical Geophysics. I am passionate about data science, education, and teaching. Currently, I am a Solutions Engineer at Squirro and, previously, I was a researcher in the Exploration and Environmental Geophysics group at ETH ZÃ¼rich. I co-supervised PhD students and MSc students, and taught a BSc class on geophysical methods. In my spare time, I run, bike, cook, build a Raspberry Pi cluster, and update my personal website.

item.title: First post on new website!
item.description: Hi folks, I’ve finally had time to work on my personal website. I’ll follow up soon with a post documenting my journey with Hugo. Stay tuned ðŸ“»ðŸ¤©
